item.title: Circle Co-ordinates
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Down with rain!

[scar]function CircleCoords(Sx, Sy, Radius, StartAngle, EndAngle: Integer): TPointArray;
var i: Integer;
begin
SetarrayLength(Result, ((EndAngle + StartAngle) + 1)-StartAngle);
for i:= StartAngle to EndAngle do
begin
Result[i].x:= Round(Radius * Sin(i * Pi / 180)) + Sx;
Result[i].y:= Round(-Radius * Cos(i * Pi / 180)) + Sy;
end;
end;

procedure Circle(Bx, By, Radius, EndAngle: Integer);
var a: TPointarray;
var i: Integer;
begin
a:= CircleCoords(Bx, By, Radius, 0, EndAngle);
for i:= 0 to GetArrayLength(a)-1 do
begin
MoveMouse(a[i].x, a[i].y);
Writeln(inttostr(a[i].x) + ', ’ + inttostr(a[i].y));
Wait(1);
end;
end;

begin
if (FindWindowTitlePart(‘SCAR’, false)) then ActivateClient;
Circle(60, 60, 70, 360);
end.
[/scar]

Read full topic
